DOC.brief_title: Health Services Implications Teledermatology Consult System
DOC.detailed_description: Background : We previously show ( IIR 95-045 ) teledermatology , use store forward technology , result reliable accurate diagnostic outcome compare clinic-based dermatology consultation . This investigation build fundamental diagnostic information assess health service implication teledermatology consult system . Objectives : To investigate health service outcomes related teledermatology implementation . Outcomes interest time diagnosis treatment initiation , proportion patient avoid need clinic-based encounter , economic analysis . Methods : Patients refer primary care clinic dermatology consult service randomize either usual care teledermatology consultation . A usual care consultation consist conventional text-based electronic consult request . A teledermatology consultation include digital image standardize history , addition electronic text-based consult . Consultant dermatologist , review consult request modality , decide , , referral require clinic-based evaluation . Status : Final report prepare review process time .
